Package utils

Class TimeUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.TimeUtility
  • public class TimeUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for converting and formatting time and timestamps.

    Christian Dewey

    • Method Detail

      • businessHoursString

        public static java.lang.String businessHoursString()
        Returns:
        The Business Hours 08:00 to 22:00 converted from EST to users Local Time

      • businessHoursOverMidnight

        public static java.time.LocalTime businessHoursOverMidnight()
        Returns:
        The time business hours end in LocalTime if it passes midnight. If not returns null.

      • businessHoursCheck

        public static boolean businessHoursCheck​(java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                         java.time.ZonedDateTime end)
        Checks if the given times fall within business hours
        Parameters:
        start - start time of the proposed appointment
        end - end time of the proposed appointment
        Returns:
        true if start and end time fall within business hours.

      • ConvertToUTCTimestamp

        public static java.sql.Timestamp ConvertToUTCTimestamp​(java.time.ZonedDateTime input)
        Parameters:
        input - the ZonedDateTime with users ZoneId
        Returns:
        the UTC Timestamp converted from a ZonedDateTime Local Time using the users ZoneId

      • TimePicker

        public static javafx.scene.control.SpinnerValueFactory<java.time.LocalTime> TimePicker​(java.time.LocalTime setTime)
        A SpinnerValueFactory for LocalTime selection.
        Parameters:
        setTime - the time the TimePicker will show as default. Pass in LocalTime.now() when creating a new appointment, or the appointments Start/End time when updating an existing one.

      • getDateFactory

        public static javafx.util.Callback<javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Appointment,​java.time.ZonedDateTime>,​javafx.scene.control.TableCell<Appointment,​java.time.ZonedDateTime>> getDateFactory()
        Returns:
        the dateFactory callback method.
